words.definition: A request to come to an event.

example.en: I received an invitation to the wedding.
I accept your invitation to the party.

words.definition: To say no to an invitation.

example.en: I must decline the invitation because I am busy.
example.ar: يجب علي رفض الدعوة لأنني مشغول.

example.en: We had a celebration for her birthday.
We are having a family gathering this weekend.
example.ar: لدينا تجمع عائلي نهاية هذا الأسبوع.

words.definition: A person who organizes an event.

example.en: My friend was the host of the party.
We had ten guests at the dinner.
example.ar: كان لدينا عشرة ضيوف على العشاء.

words.definition: To say yes to an invitation.

example.en: Please confirm if you will come.
example.ar: يرجى تأكيد ما إذا كنت ستحضر.

words.definition: A reason for not accepting an invitation.

example.en: I gave an excuse for not attending.

words.definition: To mark an event with a party.

example.en: We will celebrate New Year together.
